ProjectTitle: Advanced nonimaging optical design via physics-informed machine learning
InitialFeedbackHistory: 13/03/2025 Storage/Preservation: please note that the ICTS no longer recommends OneDrive for research data. [REDACTED] on OneDrive is stored outside of KU [REDACTED] in a [REDACTED] data center and is linked to your account, if a researcher leaves KU [REDACTED] their account will be deactivated, and the associated data will be deleted, making this solution risky. Please have a look in the storage guide for other solutions: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en. Note that KU [REDACTED] also has a GitLab that you can consider using: https://gitlab.kuleuven.be/
label: good with suggestions
